about_the_game:
Get your hands on The Symbiant Re:union Artbook (PDF) and a juicy pack of 4K CGs and sprites from the game! Peak into the behind-the-scenes sketches, art direction process of the game, and more!

What you get:

- ALL of the CGs from the game, including explicit illustrations from the sex scenes (gay) and tentacle sex (consensual)
- Each CG shown in a WIP stage of art
- Character sprites in new outfits
- All the backgrounds from the game
- An artbook of 99 pages

A pack of 4K (high resolution) all the sprites and all the CGs from the game with all of the variations (Separate folder from the Artbook!)

This content is for adults only. You must be of legal age in your country of residence to view this content.
The Symbiant Re:union - Artbook & CG Pack DLC contains nudity and explicit uncensored sex scenes (gay) and tentacle sex (consensual).

content_descriptors.notes:
This content is for adults only. You must be of legal age in your country of residence to view this content. 

The Symbiant Re:Union - Artbook DLC contains nudity and explicit uncensored sex scenes (gay) and tentacle sex (consensual).

What you get:
